name: Attempt to create a Prospect Customer with invalid Data

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier

When I create a prospect Customer with the following parameter
| dateOfBirth | firstName | lastName | email | mobilePhonePrefix | mobilePhone |
| 1980-12-12 |  |  | test@ov.com | 087 | 93476346 |
Then I should receive a Validation Error
